item.title: On-Camera Video Task - $70 - Upwork
item.description:

Pay:
$70 for a short video task

Requirements:

Comfortable being on camera
Reliable and punctual

item.title: Podcast Clip Editor - Upwork
item.description:
I am looking for someone who can identify quality content and create vertical and wide screen clips for podcasts. Ideally I would like someone who can write quality titles and descriptions for these videos as well.

Hourly Range: $20.00-$40.00
Posted On: June 27, 2024 18:44 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Instagram Reels, Audio Editing, Video Cleanup, Video Color Correction, Video Transition, Visual Effects, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro
